messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] donuts!
messages.msgSnippet: ... Ahhhhh, now there s a donut. Obviously living in Europe, I don t see either kind, although there are plenty of great German pastries to get fat on.... I
messages.messageBody:
> nope...I hate krispi kremes too. give me duncan donuts anyday!
>
Ahhhhh, now there's a donut.

Obviously living in Europe, I don't see either kind, although there are
plenty of great German pastries to get fat on....
I went to Rome for a church conference (great thing about living in
Europe....even conferences are in cool places!), and got off the train at
Termini, the main Roman train station. Walked towards the Exit, and found
myself face to face with a Dunkin Donuts. I about fell over in shock! (And
yes, I did splurge and take a dozen home to my family!)

My husband's soldiers spent several weeks debating whether a 14-hour
(one-way) train trip to Rome to get donuts was too ridiculous.

brenda
